item.title: 11 Extensions to Power up your Jupyter Notebook üñ•Ô∏è
item.description: Jupyter Notebooks are well-known for Machine Learning and Deep Learning projects. They are quite easy to use for beginners. In this article, I share 11 extensions for boosting the performance of Jupyter Notebooks. These extensions come in handy for code formatting and organizing. These extensions can be installed using ‘nbextensions’ package in Python. This article has been published as a part of Data Science Blogathon on Analytics Vidhya and has won the first prize ü•á in the article category.
